betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Electrolytic Seperator§r is a machine that can §eseparate §6liquids §einto gases§r that can be of use. These outputs gases can then be §ecollected using a bucket, a fluid tank or can be taken out using §5EnderIO§e's §6Fluid Conduit§es§r. The §edump button§r can be used to §edump out unused gases from the machine§r (§7duh§r), which is useful if you are only using one of the gases outputted (§7also because if one of the gas tanks gets full, the machine §ewill stop§r).

To make the seperator, you will need four §6Iron Ingot§rs, two §6Redstone Dust§r, two §6Enriched Alloy§rs, and an §6Electrolytic Core§r.
